description:
Mid-sized frames accommodate all kinds of faces, so everyone gets a clear view of the way ahead. Updated with Spy’s toric lens technology, you get a crystal clear and distortion-free view of the world around you.

  • Fits medium faces best
  • Happy™ lenses heighten contrast detail in challenging conditions, giving excellent clarity and detail
  • 5.5-base curve ARC® spherical dual-layer lens with anti-fog and anti-scratch protection
  • ARC Toric lens is thicker in the middle, tapered toward the edges for optically correct, distortion-free viewing from all angles
  • Flexible frame is partially made from recycled materials and conforms to nearly any face for a comfortable fit
  • RISE™ ventilation system combats lens fogging by forcing air through the frame
  • Triple-density face foam with moisture-wicking fleece
  • Wider silicone-ribbed strap with dual-adjustment
name: Spy+ Marshall 2.0 Snow Goggles - Unisex
